TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IVariableInitializerOperation implements class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IOperation, class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Operations.ISymbolInitializerOperation
type IVariableInitializerOperation = interface interface ISymbolInitializerOperation interface IOperation

Docs.summary:
Represents an initialization of a local variable.
Current usage: (1) C# local variable initializer with equals value clause. (2) VB local variable initializer with equals value clause or AsNew clause.
Docs.remarks: This interface is reserved for implementation by its associated APIs. We reserve the right to change it in the future.
